law.catch_line: City to contract for erection of building.
law.text: Every city to which a site for a building has been conveyed, as provided in KRS 162.120, shall enter into a contract or contracts with some person for the erection on the site of a building with the necessary appurtenances, according to plans and specifications adopted by the city and approved by the board of education and the chief state school officer.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, sec. 254, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4421-2.
